entries.meaning: The residue, remainder or rest of something.
(chemistry) The solid material remaining after the liquid in which it was dissolved has been evaporated; a residue.

(fuzzy logic) A binary function from [0,1] × [0,1] to [0,1] which is defined in terms of the t-norm as follows: 
  
    
      
        x
        →
        y
        =
        sup
        {
        z
        
          |
        
        z
        ∗
        x
        ⩽
        y
        }
      
    
    {\displaystyle x\rightarrow y=\sup\{z|z*x\leqslant y\}}
  
, where 
  
    
      
        ∗
      
    
    {\displaystyle *}
  
 denotes the t-norm function and 
  
    
      
        sup
      
    
    {\displaystyle \sup }
  
 denotes the supremum.
examples:
The residuum of the minimum t-norm is a function 
  
    
      
        →
      
    
    {\displaystyle \rightarrow }
  
 such that 
  
    
      
        x
        →
        y
        =
        
          
            {
            
              
                
                  y
                  ,
                
                
                  
                    if 
                  
                  x
                  >
                  y
                
              
              
                
                  1
                  ,
                
                
                  
                    if 
                  
                  x
                  ⩽
                  y
                  .
                
              
            
            
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle x\rightarrow y={\begin{cases}y,&{\text{if }}x>y\\1,&{\text{if }}x\leqslant y.\end{cases}}}
